title: Valentin Ganev
content:
Valentin Atanassov Ganev (Bulgarian: Валентин Атанасов Ганев; born 7 April 1956) is a Bulgarian theatre and film actor and theatre director.[1]

Born in Ruse, Bulgaria, Ganev graduated from the All Russian State Institute for Cinematography, Moscow (actor's classes of Sergey Bondarchuk). He is known for his work on East/West (Est-Ouest) (1999), Icon (2005), Hushove (2006), The Abandoned (2006), The Prince & Me 3: A Royal Honeymoon (2008), The Way Back (2010), J'étais à Nüremberg (2010) etc. Quite active on stage. Since 1996 he has been an actor at The National Theatre of Bulgaria.[2]

This article about a Bulgarian actor is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
